definitions.definition: A department of Nouvelle-Aquitaine , France . Capital: Angoulême ( INSEE code 16).
A river in southwestern France , flowing through the departments of Haute-Vienne , Charente , Vienne and Charente-Maritime .

main_definition: A department of Nouvelle-Aquitaine , France . Capital: Angoulême ( INSEE code 16).
secondary_definitions: A river in southwestern France , flowing through the departments of Haute-Vienne , Charente , Vienne and Charente-Maritime .
